 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (SumPathEffect)

Detailed Description

Construct a PathEffect whose effect is to apply two effects, in sequence. 

 //create a base object - PathEffect
 PathEffect pe;
 //create a polymorphism object - SumPathEffect
 pe = new SumPathEffect(first_path, second_path);
 paint.setPathEffect(pe);
 //draw on canvas
 canvas->drawPath(path, paint);
